title: Onboard Customer Rooftop Solar to VPP
description: A customer with an existing rooftop solar and battery system wants to enroll in the company's Virtual Power Plant (VPP) program.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's solar inverter and battery model are compatible with the VPP platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer's hardware is on the approved list.

tasks.description: Guide the customer through the process of providing API access to their system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step instructions for the specific hardware model.

tasks.description: Register the customer's assets in the DER management system and initiate a connection test.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the assets and confirms telemetry is being received.
